mn144:2.1: For Mahācunda, see note on [mn8:2.1](). | This Channa is evidently not the same person as the Budddha’s former charioteer who was famously admonished on the Buddha’s deathbed ([dn16:6.4.1]()).
mn144:13.5: the variant spellings between MN and SN seem irreconcilable. I follow BB in CDB, which is also accepted by Malalasekera in DPPN.
